puzzle.help: 1. In the board there are marked centers of a few 'Spiral' Galaxies. 2. These Galaxies are symmetrical to a rotation of 180 degrees. This means that rotating the shape of the Galaxy by 180 degrees (half a full turn) around the center, will result in an identical shape. 3. In the end, all the space must be included in Galaxies and Galaxies can't overlap. 4. There can be single tile Galaxies (with the center inside it) and some Galaxy center will be cross two or four tiles.
